sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>6</base_damage> <critical_rating>2</critical_rating> <defense/> <description>Largely considered a ceremonial weapon, long associated with temple guards and Imperial bodyguards, lightsaber pikes are nevertheless potent and dangerous weapons in the right hands. Similar in construction to a force pike or electrostaff, a lightsaber pike consists of a long, sturdy haft typically made of composites or strong alloys. The haft, while a respectable weapon in its own right, contains the internal workings of a standard lightsaber. When activated, a shoto- length blade springs from the end of the haft, creating a weapon between two and three meters long. Its size gives the lightsaber pike incredible reach and respectable defensive capabilities.  This lightsaber is a basic lightsaber pike hilt containing an unmodded Ilum lightsaber crystal (see page 197). This crystal occupies two of the weapon's hard points.</description> <encumbrance>3</encumbrance> <hard_points>3</hard_points> <hp_required/> <name>Lightsaber Pike</name> <number>GEAR0001029</number> <price>9600</price> <range>engaged</range> <rarity>10</rarity> <skill_used display_value="Lightsaber (Br)">9e4ce9962fe3d050e0f497eef699b630</skill_used> <soak/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 16:08:49</sys_created_on> <sys_id>c5a53e282f50a450e0f497eef699b6ba</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-02 16:08:49</sys_updated_on> <type>weapon</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
